entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
